newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: NZ registered unemployment rises in April.
newsitem.headline: NZ registered unemployment rises in April.

text.p: The number of New Zealanders registered as unemployed rose to 157,841 in April from 152,711 in March and 158,217 in February, the Employment Service said on Thursday.
The number of people on the register reflects those who have chosen, as one of their methods of looking for work, to enrol with the service and who are available for employment.
However, the Employment Service stresses that the statistics do not purport to measure official unemployment or changes in the labour market.
The official measure of unemployment is the Household Labour Force Survey, which showed the jobless rate at 6.4 percent in the March 1997 quarter.
